# Data Room Structure Template

## ĞĞ±Ğ·Ğ¾Ñ€

Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ´Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑÑ‹Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ñ€ĞµĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ´ÑƒĞµĞ¼ÑƒÑ ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞºÑ‚ÑƒÑ€Ñƒ Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ€Ñ‚ÑƒĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ data room Ğ´Ğ»Ñ due diligence Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ²ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ².

**Tool**: Docsend, Google Drive (Ñ controlled access), Box, Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Dropbox Business

---

## File Naming Convention

**Format**: `[Category]_[Document_Name]_[Version]_[Date].pdf`

**Examples**:
- `Financials_P&L_2025_v1.0_2026-01-15.xlsx`
- `Legal_Certificate_of_Incorporation_v1.0_2025-06-01.pdf`
- `Product_Pitch_Deck_v2.1_2026-01-20.pdf`

---

## Document Descriptions

### 01_Executive_Summary

**One_Pager.pdf**:
- 1-page summary Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ°
- Key metrics, ask, contact info

**Pitch_Deck_v2.1.pdf**:
- Latest version pitch deck
- 12-15 slides

**Investment_Memo.pdf** (optional):
- Detailed memo (5-10 pages)
- Why invest, risks, opportunities

---

### 02_Company_Overview

**Company_Profile.pdf**:
- Company name, address, incorporation date
- Legal entity type (C-Corp, LLC, etc.)
- EIN, state registration

**Mission_Vision_Values.pdf**:
- Mission statement
- Vision (Ğ³Ğ´Ğµ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ¼ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ· 5 Ğ»ĞµÑ‚)
- Core values

**Team_Bios.pdf**:
- Founders + key team members
- Photos, backgrounds, LinkedIn

---

### 03_Product

**MVP_Specification.pdf**:
- What's in MVP, what's not
- User flows
- Technical requirements

**Product_Roadmap.pdf**:
- 12-24 month roadmap
- Planned features, timelines

**System_Architecture.pdf**:
- High-level architecture diagram
- Tech stack
- Security design

---

### 04_Market

**Market_Analysis.pdf**:
- TAM/SAM/SOM calculations
- Growth rate (CAGR)
- Market trends

**Competitive_Analysis.pdf**:
- Competitor comparison matrix
- Strengths/weaknesses
- Differentiation

**Customer_Personas.pdf**:
- Target customer profiles
- Demographics, psychographics
- Pain points, needs

---

### 05_Business_Model

**Business_Model_Canvas.pdf**:
- 9-block canvas (customer segments, value prop, etc.)

**Pricing_Strategy.pdf**:
- Pricing tiers (Free, Premium, Enterprise)
- Pricing logic, market comparisons

**Unit_Economics.xlsx**:
- LTV calculation
- CAC breakdown by channel
- LTV/CAC ratio
- Payback period

---

### 06_Traction_Metrics

**Key_Metrics_Dashboard.pdf**:
- Current snapshot: users, revenue, engagement
- Updated monthly

**User_Growth_Chart.xlsx**:
- Monthly user growth (last 12 months + projections)
- Charts: MAU, DAU, signups

**Cohort_Analysis.xlsx**:
- Retention by cohort
- Revenue by cohort

---

### 07_Financials

**Historical P&L**:
- Revenue breakdown (Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´ÑƒĞºÑ‚Ğ°Ğ¼, Ñ€ĞµĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼)
- Operating expenses (COGS, OpEx)
- EBITDA, Net Income

**Financial_Model_3_Year.xlsx**:
- Detailed model (monthly for Year 1, quarterly Year 2-3)
- Revenue, expenses, cash flow, headcount
- Linked assumptions sheet

**Use_of_Funds.pdf**:
- How Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ¼ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ»ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°
- % breakdown (product, marketing, hiring, etc.)
- Milestones tied to funding

---

### 08_Fundraising

**Fundraising_History.pdf**:
- Previous rounds (dates, amounts, investors)
- SAFEs, convertible notes, priced rounds

**Cap_Table.xlsx**:
- Current ownership (founders, investors, employees)
- Fully diluted shares
- Option pool

**Term_Sheet_Template.pdf**:
- Your preferred terms (valuation, liquidation preference, board seats)
- Optional: can wait until investor proposes

---

### 09_Corporate_Legal

**Certificate_of_Incorporation.pdf**:
- Official document from state
- Authorized shares, par value

**Board_Meeting_Minutes**:
- Last 12-24 months
- Decisions, resolutions

**Stock_Option_Plan.pdf**:
- ESOP document
- Total shares reserved, vesting terms

---

### 10_Contracts

**Terms_of_Service.pdf**:
- Current version
- User agreement

**Vendor_Contracts**:
- Key vendors (AWS, Stripe, etc.)
- Redact sensitive pricing if needed

**Partnership_Agreements**:
- School partnerships, ISP bundles, etc.

---

### 11_Intellectual_Property

**IP_Overview.pdf**:
- Summary: what IP we have
- Trademarks (Rork-Kiku name, logo)
- Patents (if any)

**IP_Assignment_Agreements.pdf**:
- Confirmation: Ğ²ÑĞµ employees assigned IP Ğº ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¸

---

### 12_Compliance_Regulatory

**COPPA_Compliance_Documentation.pdf**:
- How Ğ¼Ñ‹ comply Ñ COPPA
- Parental consent process
- FTC guidance followed

**Security_Audit_Reports.pdf**:
- Internal security review
- External pentest (if completed)

---

### 13_HR_People

**Org_Chart.pdf**:
- Visual chart Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑƒÑ‰ĞµĞ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ´Ñ‹
- Reporting structure

**Employee_List.xlsx**:
- Name, role, start date, salary (optional: Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ redacted)
- Equity grants

**Hiring_Plan.pdf**:
- Roles to hire (Q1-Q4 2026)
- Estimated costs

---

### 14_Operations

**Key_Vendors_List.xlsx**:
- Vendor name, service, monthly cost
- Critical vendors marked

**Insurance_Policies.pdf**:
- D&O insurance
- Cyber insurance
- General liability

---

### 15_Customer_References

**Customer_Testimonials.pdf**:
- Quotes Ğ¾Ñ‚ beta users
- Names (if permission), anonymized otherwise

**Case_Studies.pdf**:
- Detailed stories (school pilot, family use case)

---

### 16_Press_Media

**Press_Coverage.pdf**:
- Articles, podcasts, mentions
- Links + screenshots

**Press_Kit.pdf**:
- Logo, product images, boilerplate
- For journalists

---

## Access Control & Security

### Tiered Access

**Tier 1 (Initial Interest)**:
- 01_Executive_Summary
- 02_Company_Overview
- 04_Market

**Tier 2 (Serious Interest, NDA signed)**:
- All folders except:
  - 07_Financials (summary only, not full bank statements)
  - 09_Corporate_Legal (summary, not full contracts)
  - 13_HR_People (anonymized)

**Tier 3 (Term Sheet Signed / Final DD)**:
- Full access to all folders

### NDA Requirement

**Before granting access**:
1. Investor signs NDA (template in legal folder)
2. Track NDA in spreadsheet (investor name, date signed)
3. Grant Docsend/Drive access

**NDA should cover**:
- Confidentiality of materials
- Non-solicitation (Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ employees)
- Non-compete (reasonable, ĞµÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾)
- Return/destruction of materials

### Watermarking

**Sensitive documents**:
- Watermark Ñ investor name + "Confidential"
- Tools: Adobe Acrobat, Docsend (automatic)

---

## Maintenance & Updates

### Frequency

- **Monthly**: Update metrics (06_Traction_Metrics)
- **Quarterly**: Update financials (07_Financials)
- **As needed**: Add new contracts, board minutes, etc.

### Version Control

- Keep previous versions (v1.0, v1.1, v2.0)
- Update README with changelog

### Changelog

Track changes Ğ² README:

```
# Changelog

## 2026-01-20
- Added: Pitch Deck v2.1
- Updated: Financial Model (Q4 2025 actuals)
- Added: School Partnership Agreement (signed)

## 2025-12-15
- Initial data room setup
- Added: All core documents
```

---

## Q&A Document

**Create FAQ** (Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ´ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ„Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ»):

**Common investor questions**:
1. Q: Why ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ market? A: [Your answer]
2. Q: What about big tech competition? A: [Answer]
3. Q: How Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ·Ğ°Ñ‰Ğ¸Ñ‰Ğ°ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚ IP theft? A: [Answer]
4. Q: ĞŸĞ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ¼Ñƒ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾ child safety, Ğ° Ğ½Ğµ broader parenting? A: [Answer]

**Update Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğµ ĞºĞ°Ğ¶Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ DD call** â€” ĞµÑĞ»Ğ¸ investor ÑĞ¿Ñ€Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ²Ğ°ĞµÑ‚, Ğ²ĞµÑ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğµ.

---

## Tools & Costs

### Docsend (Recommended)

**Pros**:
- Analytics (ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ», ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ¸)
- NDA-gating (automatic)
- Link expiration
- Professional appearance

**Cons**:
- Paid ($10-50/Ğ¼ĞµÑ)

**Alternative**: Google Drive + controlled sharing (free, Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑŒÑˆĞµ features)

**Ğ¡Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑƒÑ**: Ready Ğ´Ğ»Ñ implementation  
**ĞĞ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ**: ĞŸĞ¾ Ğ¼ĞµÑ€Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ³Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ¸ Ğº fundraising, quarterly maintenance
